subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Unorthodox variant {{Han simp|趨|f=芻|t=刍|nocap=y}}. First attested in {{w|Cihai}} 《{{w2|zh|辭海}}》, a semi-encyclopedic dictionary published in China from 1936-1938. <!-- Note: This character may have appeared in 《宋元以來俗字譜·走部》 published in 1930 but actual copy of the book is needed to verify its existence -->
